response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features and unparalleled quality. Given its immense worth to you at $800,000, we aim to bridge the gap and offer it to you at a competitive price of $950,000. This proposal not only ensures a fair transaction but also provides you with substantial savings. We believe this is an excellent chance for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
